document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Cimex lunulata Goeze, 1778 : 275
;
Cimex lynx Fabricius, 1794 : 110
;
Mormidea pusio Fieber, 1861 : 336
(non Kolenati, 1846 );
Carpocoris lynx
var. decolor
Ferrari, 1874
: 129
;
Carpocoris ( Antheminia ) lunulatus
var. pallidior Kirkaldy, 1909 : 57
;
Carpocoris lunulatus
var. nigricornis Kormilev, 1936 : 36
;
Codophila ( Antheminia ) lunulata
var. eckerleini Tamanini
: 598 ;
Antheminia lunulata
var. robusta
Putshkov, 1965
: 261
.

New data. Isfahan province: 30 km N of Natanz,
N 33 ° 48 ’ 51.1’’
–
E 51 ° 40 ’ 53.7’’
, 4001 ft asl,
7 .v. 2013
, J. Haxaire rec, P. Ducamps det et leg.
General distribution. Euro-Siberian, known in Algeria and Pakistan .

Host plants. On Asteraceae (
Linnavuori 2008
; Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 ),
Populus nigra nigra
( Salicaceae ) (
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 b
), Apiaceae (
Modarres Awal 1996 a
,
1997 b
),
Eruca sativa
( Ericaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ); on wild
Poaceae (
Khalilzadeh et al . 2007
)
, cereals (
Askari et al . 2009
;
Hassanzadeh et al . 2009 a
;
Sadeghi et al . 2009
;
Khaghaninia et al . 2010 a
, b ;
Khaghaninia et al . 2011
),
Scrophulariaceae (Ribes & Pagola Carte 2013 )
.
